text: Imi vanotenda! Mukaenda (kunorwa) munzira yaAllah, ivai munotarisisa, musave munotaura ani zvake uyo anokumhoresai (nokutambira Islaam): “Hausi mutendi;” muchitsvaga zvinhu zvinopfuura zvehupenyu hwenyika. Asi Allah ndivo vane mibairo nenhimbiri zhinji. Mange makadaro mushure sezvaari ikozvino, Allah vakakumborerai (i.e. vakakuratidzai gwara reIslaam), naizvozvo, ivai munongwarira marwadzo. Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanoziva zvose zvamunoita
